projects.title: HTML/CSS Reflection
projects.description: My first major assignment in the SCS was to recreate the Netmatters website as pixel-perfect as possible using all the HTML and CSS knowledge I had gained thus far. Later in the course, I was tasked to revisit this project and add JavaScript functionality.

projects.title: Pair Project
projects.description: I was paired up with another student on the course and given a website design to create from scratch. This was my first experience collaborating on a web project, as well as creating a consistent site-wide design from a single page concept.

projects.title: JavaScript Reflection
projects.description: This was my first project where I had a lot of freedom and could design a site with JavaScript in mind from the start. I was tasked with implementing an API that would load a random image which the user could then assign to a validated email address.
